segments.text: My attention is drawn to the right side of the kitchen, near the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running freely, and the single basin is completely full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is now spilling over the front edge of the sink in a continuous sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a widening puddle on the counter and the floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lower cabinet doors are getting soaked, stream after stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can only imagine the damage this water is doing to the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman standing there remains completely oblivious to the rising tide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying a plate, lost in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already submerged in the puddle, yet she shows no sign of noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a waste of water, just pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could lead to serious repairs if it continues unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between her calm action and the developing disaster is stark.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a messy situation, truly unsettling to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
